casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Jeron FRAIRSON, Appellant. No. ED 105204 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FIVE. Filed: February 13, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied March 26, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied May 22, 2018 Ryan J. Kiwala, One Court Street, Alton, IL 62002, for appellant. Joshua D. Hawley, Atty. Gen., Garrick Aplin, Asst. Atty. Gen., P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, MO 65102, for respondent. Before James M. Dowd, C.J., Lawrence E. Mooney, J., and Stanley J. Wallach, Sp.J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Jaron Frairson, appeals the judgment of conviction entered by the trial court after the jury found him guilty of second-degree murder, Section 565.021 RSMo., first-degree assault, Section 565.050 RSMo., and two counts of armed criminal action, Section 571.015 RSMo. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. We have furnished the parties with a memorandum, for their information only, setting forth the reasons for our order. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
